name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatTuesday.com - Customized Data. Empower with Gen-AI Platform

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the full potential of a personalized chatbot in the style of ChatGPT, flawlessly integrated with your exclusive data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatTuesday.com unleash the full potential of a personalized chatbot in the style of ChatGPT, flawlessly integrated with your exclusive data. Our platform converts your data into a cutting-edge Generative AI digital assistant, empowering you to embed it on your website or leverage its versatility through our integrations and API. Elevate your data to engage in dynamic conversations with our tailor-made Generative AI digital solution.

Comprehensive Gen-AI Chatbot Features

1. Customized Data Sources
Combination of pdf, dropbox, Typeform and website to custom your data sources

2. Customize Configuration
Tailor-made each bot in different models and roles 

3. Create Multiple Bots
Build your custom bot for multiple use cases

4. Support Multiple Languages
Pre-built translation modules support different languages

Discover Our Features : Everything you need for your no-code AI chatbot.

1. Lead Generation
Capture leads and acquire customer data, delivering a tailored experience in the process

2. Simple Integration
Link your data sources, upload files, or include a website for crawling, and ChatTuesday will utilize this information to train your digital assistant.

3. Easy Customization
You can easy to configure your digital assistant in different role such as sales agent or customer service.

Use cases

1. Product Design Generation
Capture leads and acquire customer data, delivering a tailored experience in the process.

2. Report Analysis
Link your data sources, upload files, or include a website for crawling, and ChatTuesday will utilize this information to train your digital assistant.

3. Data Comparison
Compare the data and generate insight for product comparison, competitor tracking.

4. Build Chatbot
Connect your website and build the Chatbot automatically. You can configure your bot as sales assistant or customer service agent.

What is the feature of ChatTuesday.com Chrome?

The "ChatTuesday.com" Chrome extension enhances your Chat Tuesday experience by providing seamless redirection based on your browsing context. When your new tab and you click on the extension icon, it automatically directs you to the Chat Tuesday homepage or login page depends as you have already logged in or not, ready to engage with the platform.

Moreover, the extension intelligently checks your existing plan to ensure efficient navigation. If you have an active plan with Chat Tuesday and there is no specific URL open in your tab, clicking the extension will redirect you to personalized dashboard. If your plan is expired then extension will redirect you to Subscription page. This feature streamlines your workflow, ensuring you're always where you need to be within Chat Tuesday with just a single click.

Features:

New Tab Redirect: Clicking the extension in an new tab instantly takes you to the Chat Tuesday homepage .

Plan-Based Redirection: If you have an active Chat Tuesday plan and no specific URL open, the extension redirects you to your personalized dashboard page. If your plan is expired the extension redirects you to your Subscription page.

Benefits:

Efficiency: Save time by being directly navigated to Chat Tuesday when your tab is empty.

Personalized Experience: Enjoy a tailored experience based on your Chat Tuesday subscription plan.

Convenience: One-click access to your Chat Tuesday dashboard or plan page, eliminating the need for manual navigation.

Instructions:

Install the "Chat Tuesday Redirect" extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar.

If the tab is empty, you will be redirected to the Chat Tuesday homepage or Login page.

If you have an active plan and no specific URL open, the extension will take you to your personalized dashboard page.

If your plan is expired the extension redirects you to your Subscription page.

Note: To benefit from plan-based redirection, ensure you are logged into Chat Tuesday and have an active subscription.

Upgrade your Chat Tuesday experience with the "Chat Tuesday Chrome" extension today!
